price: 30. Na yango: Bokolinga eloko te sé ezala na bolingi ya Allah. Ya sólo, Allah azali moyebi atonda bwanya.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
